text:
This popular novelty shop is the culmination of [[Isan Chashy]]â€™s lifetime of travel, during which he saw every country in [[Khorvaire]], traveled to [[Xen'drik]] and [[Aerenal]] several
times, and even once came within a few yards of the
shores of the [[Seren]] Islands. Though Isan is no longer in
any physical condition to travel the rest of the world, his
shop brings the world to him.

Visitors to this popular novelty shop are greeted with the sights of [[Xen'drik]]. Exotic plants in pots and replicas of artifacts can be found throughout the shop. In addition to novelties and [[trinket]]s, Isan also sells a wide variety of [[magic item]]s. His three daughters help him run the shop.
title: Isan's Extrinsic Emporium
